definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Problems of postharvest treatment which were still existed were discussed too.
sentences.chinese: 同时对果品采后处理存在的问题进行了说明。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the growth substance can improve the fruit quality of the sweet cherry, and reach the effects on nutrition and health care.
sentences.chinese: 同时还可提高甜樱桃的果品品质，达到营养保健作用。

sentences.english: Fruit bagging is one of the key methods in producing green fruits.
sentences.chinese: 果实套袋是生产绿色果品的关键技术措施之一。

sentences.english: Pear is a fruit tree widely cultivated in the most contries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 梨在世界果品产业中占有重要的经济地位。

sentences.english: Our company sells fresh fruits all year round.
sentences.chinese: 本公司一年四季供应时鲜果品。

sentences.english: Warmly welcome fruit society to join us.
sentences.chinese: 热诚欢迎果品同业者加入中国果协。

sentences.english: To improve fruit quality and yield.
sentences.chinese: 提高果品的质量和产量。

sentences.english: This will not only prevent senescence but will also contribute to better fruit quality.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅为了防止早衰，并有助于提高果品质量。

sentences.english: The measures for reducing the content of nitrate in fruits are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对降低果品中硝酸盐含量的措施进行了讨论。

sentences.english: We are now doing a large import business in fruits from Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 我们的业务是大批量进品东南亚的果品。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
